com.yelllabs.soapy.helpers
[Groovy] Class Randomizer

java.lang.Object
  com.yelllabs.soapy.helpers.Randomizer

class Randomizer
extends java.lang.Object

brief:
A helper class that consist of various methods that generate random values (int, double, string etc);
lastUpdate:
2011-12-11
changeLog:
2011-12-11 randString(X) methods added
Authors:
Janusz Kowalczyk (38115ja)

Method Detail

randRange

static java.lang.Integer randRange(int Min, int Max)
brief:
Randomly selects int value from specific range
Parameters:
Min - - min range value
Max - - max range value
Returns:
A random int from specific a range. Return NULL when Min < Max

randRange

static java.lang.Double randRange(double Min, double Max)
brief:
Randomly selects double value from a specific range
Parameters:
Min - - min range value
Max - - max range value
Returns:
A random double from specific a range. Return NULL when: Min=0 && Min<1 && Max>0 && Max<=1

randString

static java.lang.String randString(int minLength, int maxLength)
brief:
Returns randomly generated alphanumeric string with given lenght
Returns:
A random String;

randString

static java.lang.String randString()
brief:
Generates random string with variable length between 4 and 16 chars.
Returns:
A random String;

randString

static java.lang.String randString(java.lang.String regex)
brief:
Return randomly generated string using a Xeger library, that works as a reverse RegExp;
Returns:
A random String;
